title: UI/UX Consistency & Standardization Refactor

business_impact.description: Standardize Tailwind configuration, icon systems, button patterns, and theme switching to improve maintainability and user experience consistency.

notes: Approach pivoted from external lmdr-config.js to inline Tailwind config (Wix iframe incompatibility). 45/56+ files partially tokenized, 34 files retain hardcoded color classes. Admin portal largely untouched (2/11 files).
